name: Red-Eyes Undead Reborn
text:
During this Duel, you cannot Normal or Special Summon any monsters from your hand or Deck except for Level 4 or lower DARK Zombie-Type monsters.
The following effect can be used once per Duel. Send up to 2 Level 6 or lower Zombie-Type monsters from your hand to your Graveyard. Then, Set 1 "Zombie Reborn" from outside of your Deck to your field and send 1 "Red-Eyes Zombie Dragon Lord" from your Extra Deck to your Graveyard (that monster can be Special Summoned). Until the end of your next turn, you cannot Special Summon Level 7 or higher monsters from your Extra Deck or Graveyard except for Synchro Monsters.
